oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Highlander Folk School Informational Booklet
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Booklet detailing the history and activities at Highlander. As this was published in 1941, it focuses primarily on Highlander's labor organization as it had not yet begun focusing on civil rights and desegregation.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Community development; Community education; Labor union members; Leadership--Study and teaching; Johnson, Lilian Wyckoff, 1864-1956; Community centers; Study and teaching (Residency); Residence and education; Recreation; Cooperative schools; Rural extension; Adult education; Fieldwork (Educational method); Educators
